text:
Hi

Would you consider adding our tutorial on CGI.pm to your Apache documentation 
section?

Thanks,

Vikram Vaswani
Melonfire
creator: bacchus@vsnl.com

text:
There are a lot of CGI tutorials out there.  This one isn't really a tutorial at all; it's a feed to amazon.  There's more advert than content on the page referenced, and it's designed to prevent accessing any content without first viewing the advertising.

Besides, people who spam with web tutorials should at least start with some basics like getting their HTML right.
creator: nick@webthing.com
